name: EnvironmentObject
desc: A property wrapper type for an observable object supplied by a parent or ancestor view.

items.name: var wrappedValue: ObjectType
items.desc: The underlying value referenced by the environment object.

items.name: var projectedValue: EnvironmentObject<ObjectType>.Wrapper
items.desc: A projection of the environment object that creates bindings to its properties using dynamic member lookup.

items.name: struct Wrapper
items.desc: A wrapper of the underlying environment object that can create bindings to its properties using dynamic member lookup.
